name: Bag of Bones
description:
Bag of Bones is a 2D Action RPG with  Hack & Slash elements and puzzles. Inspired by the old zelda games. In Bag of Bones you follow the life of a necromancers pet called Smipat.  Smipat will find its way trough the challanges to reach it's endgoal.

[WARNING] This is an early protoytpe of the game, and contains some bugs. There also might be so some features that wont make it to the game.

This prototype contains 6 testable levels with each it's own type of challange. It has 2 playable items. The Bone and Bone & Arrow. There are 3 types of enemies. Slime, Mouse and Spider. And at last you could fight one Boss the mighty Slime King. 

You could report bugs and give feedback inside the game.

Future features 
  • 10 unique items with each it's own use for puzzles
  • A progressive leveling system
  • Gear that makes you stronger and more resistant
  • Talents to change your way of playing
  • Epic boss battles
  • A variety of monsters with each its own small mechanics
  • 7 types of biomes
